name: Death Rally (Classic)
description: You start out from the bottom of the ranking list. Your objective: earn money in the blitzkrieg-battle races. Fight hard for each precious championship point. Fellow competitors are showering you in a constant hail of bullets. Each race is deadly contest - a matter of life or death.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 Memory: 2 GB RAM

reviews.review_text: A classic, fun and well made game! Too many new games are trying to clone this great classic!

I haven't played this game since the shareware days and it's still good enough to play all the way through to the end! Brings back memories and the gameplay holds up to this day with precision controls and a proper AI that scales appropriately. It's still just as good as you remember, except for the resolution of course... but that's to be expected. Great 2D race game that is similar to Rock'n'Roll Racing. There are different cars, upgrades and weapons. Game controlls well and is pretty fun.

Oh boy, i've been waiting many years to get my hands on this game again... It's so nostalgic!   The game is great, so much better than the remake. It is old and looks ugly for todays standards, but it didn't aged that bad. Working perfectly on El Capitan, there is a tuto on the community on how to solve the compability issue.  Too bad MP is not working :/
